body.p:
This affiant Sabrina Wray states that She is the wife of John C. Wray that she lives in Allen county Kentucky. The last time I saw my Husband was in October 1862. I have heard from about him several times since And the information I have received from about him since is that he is dead. The last information I have on the subject is, that received from my half brother, who wrote to me sometime ago, & he informed me in a letter that He had seen a man who was reliable that informed him that he knew Jno C. Wray very well and that he was dead and that He had been dead some considerable time and I further state that from all the information I have on the subject I believe he is now dead and died about
November 1862, from the best information I have on the subject.
Subscribed & sworn to before me by Sabina Wray this the 25th March 1864
William Mansfield J, A, C, C
